t: Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection
s: Transparency protects your brand and customers from counterfeits by ensuring that every unit shipped is authentic. Learn more about Amazon Transparency.
We are committed to ensure 100% Purchase Protection for customers by offering genuine products, secure payments and easy returns for items shopped on Amazon.in.

t: How can we trust the products we purchase through Amazon? Many are inferior brand copies, especially expensive hair products. - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 5): Well, you can’t really. I’d say trust reviews, but those have been demonstrated to be very fake-eable too. Further, and rather oddly, Amazon has a nasty habit of removing and banning legit reviews/reviewers, as many can attest. The only thing you can really do is buy it ...

t: How to check a product on Amazon if it’s brand or not - Quora
s: Answer: Somewhere in the Amazon descriptions is a section that lists all the vital information about the product. If you don’t find the manufacturer named in the details, you know it is off-label. In this example, the manufacturer name (BOSE) is prominent in the title.

June 16, 2021 - Product reviews are an important part of customers' shopping experience. They help customers with their purchase decisions and providing a way for selling partners to differentiate their products from other similar items.
